meanings.definition: The quality or state of being luscious.
meanings.sent1: The lusciousnesses of the ripe strawberries made them irresistible.
meanings.sent2: I savored the lusciousnesses of the chocolate cake.
meanings.sent3: The lusciousnesses of the ice cream caused a delightful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like lusciousnesses flowing through the air.
meanings.sent5: The lusciousnesses of the tropical fruits transported me to paradise.

meanings.definition: The deliciousness or richness of something.
meanings.sent1: The lusciousnesses of the homemade pie filled the room with a sweet aroma.
meanings.sent2: The lusciousnesses of the dish left everyone wanting more.
meanings.sent3: The lusciousnesses of the dessert was so tempting, I couldn't resist.
meanings.sent4: The lusciousnesses of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The lusciousnesses of the wine lingered on my taste buds long after each sip.
